body_content.explanation: the action or process of breaking something into small parts or of being broken up in this way:
examples: It was partly the fragmentation of the opposition which helped to get the Republicans re-elected.
He claimed that social fragmentation was a by-product of the internet.

body_content.explanation: a process in which an organism breaks into different parts, with each part growing into a complete new organism:
examples: Fragmentation can be seen in various algae.
A schistocyte is a red blood cell undergoing fragmentation.
